text_section1.text: Eddie could never be confused in this world... but...

text_section2.text: The Fourth Dimension is a Many Splattered Thing!

text_section3.text: Eddie -- No! Don't go through that screen!

text_section1.text: At the time, Max Hall and I owned a little hat store on high street -- and on Sunday we liked to relax in the apartment we shared. But when the trouble started, our relaxing days were over --
This makes the third time we've been robbed! I wonder who's at the bottom of it?

text_section2.text: This time we're going to stay awake and find out!

text_section1.text: The raids hadn't netted the thieves any big hauls -- in fact, they didn't take anything of real value. Just odd items like a comb, a clock -- things like that. That night, Max and I stayed awake and alert --
Suddenly, in the darkness, a strange light began to flicker. It became larger until it took on the proportions of a movie screen! Then a kaleidoscope of shifting colors began to move across it --
Then the colors vanished and the screen was a glaring white -- when we saw something come out of it--
Our eyes popped like saucers as the thing blended with the shadows --
We couldn't make out what it was -- but we could hear it rustling about -- in fact, it was rustling Max's cigarette lighter, his fountain pen and new hat!
That got my dander up! I heard Max yell as I leaped for the intruder --

text_section2.text: Eddie! Don't!! That thing might be dangerous!

text_section1.text: It heard me. It moved like greased lightning. It leaped into the blazing screen, with me, Eddie Michaels, right on its heels!
Without giving it much thought, I flung myself into that white light in hot pursuit --
Well -- there was something on the other side, all right. But it wasn't anything I'd ever known. Even I looked different!
Every time I moved, I changed shape. And the shapes I took startled me out of my wits!
Experimenting with this ability to shift all sorts of angles, curves and circles, I managed to assume simpler forms to make exploring easier --
If I knew I'd land here, I'd have never dived into that screen!
Gosh! There's no up or down or sideways here --
Wow!
The place was really wild. I decided to make my way back to the screen again, when the action started!
I began to run, but whatever it was that was trying to trap me -- was out to head me off!
I dodged like a broken field runner, trying to get through the whole Notre Dame team!
This thing was throwing all sorts of fantastic shapes at me. Then it got after me in earnest --

text_section2.text: It's turned into a wheel and it's really making speed!

text_section1.text: That wheel grew bigger as it got closer. When it was almost on top of me, it was gigantic!
Suddenly, the wheel broke up into a load of discs that fell on me like records on a needle --
For a second, it looked like that was as far as I was going to get. Then I saw the screen and made a leap for it --
I came barreling through that screen still hog-tied. But it was a girl clinging to me instead of those blasted discs --
At that moment the screen began to hiss and crackle and sputter -- then it blew itself out in a loud puff!
When the girl told me she came from Mars, I believed her. When she told me she came to Earth through the fourth dimension, I believed that! But when she claimed to be in love with me -- I said --

text_section2.text: That's silly! We don't even know each other!

text_section3.text: I know you! Your photograph was the first thing I took when I began raiding your place for souvenirs!

text_section1.text: Then you were the burglar I chased into the fourth dimension!

text_section2.text: Yes! You're brave as well as handsome! That was a scary place for a new-comer -- things look so different there!

text_section1.text: All those nutty shapes that were chasing me -- they were -- you!

text_section2.text: Yes! Do I look better in the third dimension?

text_section1.text: I must admist you look sensational!

text_section2.text: You know -- I can't go back to Mars -- not until they build another screen! What will I do?

text_section1.text: First -- marry me! Second -- return my new hat!

text_section2.text: First -- I will. Second -- I can't! It's on Mars -- in a museum for curiousities!
